Moratorium.origin: [New Latin, from Late Latin, neuter of moratorius dilatory, from morari to delay, from mora delay]

-ria.definition: [New Latin, from Late Latin, neuter ofdilatory, fromto delay, fromdelay]

1 a.definition: an authorized period of delay in the performance of an obligation (as the paying of a debt)

sub_terms.b: a waiting period set by an authority
